key_risks: Environmental and regulatory risks, including methane emissions and landfill operations
Financial and legal risks from class action lawsuits and regulatory disputes
Market and operational risks, such as recycling market volatility and labor challenges
controversies: Class action lawsuits alleging deceptive pricing practices
Public opposition to landfill expansions, e.g., Chiquita Canyon Landfill closure
Regulatory disputes over water pollution and environmental violations
environmental_issues: Methane emissions and inadequate landfill gas monitoring
Hazardous air pollutants from landfill operations
Vulnerability to new methane emission regulations
social_issues: Community resistance to landfill expansions due to environmental and quality-of-life concerns
Labor shortages and rising wage pressures in the waste management industry
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance challenges and potential fines
Integration risks from aggressive acquisition strategy
